## Advanced ggplotting

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(patchwork)
library(TeachingDemos)
char2seed("headwaters")

time <- read.csv("./BatchProcessingfiles/TotalTimeOnFlowers.csv")
nflowers <- read.csv("./BatchProcessingfiles/TotalFlowers.csv")
stems <- read.csv("./BatchProcessingfiles/NonBuddingStems.csv")
berry <- read.csv("./BatchProcessingfiles/BerryData.csv")
time <- complete.cases(time$TotalTimeOnFlowers)
head(Time)

#####################################################
seed <- read.csv(file="BerryProcessingData.csv",na.strings="")
View(seed)

# scatterplot using qplot()
# not publishable but gives a quick look at data.
qplot(x=mass,
      y=brix,
      data=seed,
      geom=c("smooth","point"),method="lm")

seed <- seed[1:486,]
View(seed)

# ggplot boxplot
p1 <- ggplot(seed,aes(x=farm,
                      y=total.berries)) + geom_boxplot()
print (p1)

p1 + theme_bw()



# boxplot
ggplot(seed, aes(x=treatment,
                 y=total.berries,
                 fill=treatment)) +
  geom_boxplot()




```
